title.narrative: Building capacities for increased public investment in integrated climate change adaptation and disaster risk reduction: 2012 - 2015

description.narrative: The all objective of this 3-year initiative is to strengthen capacities for unified climate change adaptation (CCA) and disaster risk reduction (DRR) through increased public investment and deeper understanding of risk in approximately 40 countries in Asia-Pacific, Africa, Latin America and the Caribbean. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
